GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
of: overlay: fix null pointer dereferencing in find_dup_cset_node_entry() and find_dup_cset_prop()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 2b4af99b44861646013821019dd13a4ac48c0219, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 2fe0e8769df9fed5098daea7db933bc414c329d7. For more details please see the references link.
